'''Beta 1.16.30.57''' is the seventh and final [[RenderDragon]] beta version for [[Bedrock Edition 1.16.200]], released on October 22, 2020,<ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/360050801472|title=Minecraft with RTX Beta - 1.16.30.57 (Windows 10)|date=October 22, 2020}}</ref> which improves performance. This is the final RTX Beta released in 2020.

== Fixes ==
* Improved performance while playing with ray tracing enabled.</onlyinclude>
